overview: A journey to the grassroots of stock car racing to one of the South's fastest short tracks where Jeff Gordon, Scott Riggs, Jimmy Johnson, Jeff and Ward Burton, and many other racing greats launched their careers. The film follows drivers, family members, and track officials who share about the challenges, passions, and rewards of competing in the minor leagues of stock car racing.
tagline: Portrait of a Southern Racing Community
title: Go Fast, Turn Left
